name: Bouncy Bon
description:
Description

You awake in a ditch, and you want to sell a pitch, but you don't got a hitch. Time to find a- ouch! You got hit by a falling block! Ouch! Another falling block! Oh my, they keep on coming.

Play as Bon, a bunny that can obviously jump high. Climb your way to the top.

Created for the UTS Playmakers Game Jam (September 2022). Made in 2 days.

Credits
  • Game developed by DoMess (me)
  • Art concepts by Krystal (my sister)
  • Art created by DoMess
  • Music created by https://freemusicarchive.org/music/holiznacc0/

Bon is Based
